find_rule: js:var s=getResCode();var json={};eval('json='+s);var res={};var d=[];for(var i=0;i<json.data.object_list.length;i++){var j = json.data.object_list[i]; var r = {};r.pic_url=j.photo.path.replace('.jpeg','.thumb.400_0.jpeg').replace('.jpg','.thumb.400_0.jpg');r.desc=j.sender.username;r.title='å£çº¸'+j.photo.path;r.url=j.photo.path;d.push(r);}res.data = d;setHomeResult(res);

find_rule: js: var json={}; eval('json=' + getResCode());var res={};var d=[];for(var i=0;i<json.data.length;i++){var r={};var j=json.data[i];r.title=j.title;if(j.has_image){r.pic_url='http:'+j.image_field.url}else{r.pic_url='*'}r.desc=j.summary;r.url='http:'+j.target_url;if(r.title !== null && r.title !== undefined && r.title!== '')d.push(r);}res.data=d;setHomeResult(res);
